description: Table to store the audit log information for questionnaire series answer records. The audit log contains data such as the last update instant, date, action, questionnaire ID, User (EMP) ID, and Patient Access Account (WPR) ID.

columns.name: SERIES_ANS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the series answer record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SRS_ACTION_INS_DTTM
columns.description: This column is used to store the instant when there is a update on this record.

columns.name: SRS_ACTION_DATE
columns.description: This column is used to store the action date for this questionnaire series.

columns.name: SRS_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column is used to store the actions taken for this questionnaire series.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Enable Series - Provider


Enable Series - Reporting Workbench


Enable Series - BPA


Enable Series - UnMerge


Enable Series - Pending


Enable Series - Procedure Pass


Enable Series - Research Automatic Assignment


Enable Series - Research Activity Assignment


Disable Series - Provider


Disable Series - Reporting Workbench


Disable Series - Merge


Disable Series - Contact Mover


Disable Series - Batch Job


Disable Series - Patient Opted Out


Disable Series - Found New Treatment


Disable Series - Procedure Pass


Disable Series - Patient Expired


Disable Series - Research Activity Retraction


Enable Questionnaire


Disable Questionnaire


Send Questionnaire Reminder


Completed

columns.name: SRS_ACT_QUESR_ID
columns.description: This column is used to store the questionnaire ID for the audit action

columns.name: SRS_ACT_QUESR_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: SRS_ACT_USER_ID
columns.description: This column is used to store who made this action.

columns.name: SRS_ACT_WPR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the web portal ID of the user who answered the questionnaire.
